Articles.Content:
As soon as all the textures in my game load, ksp.exe crashes and the game shuts down. Technologically inept me would really appreciate some help from anyone who can help out. Thanks in advance.

Here's my output_log: https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B_x3yW8HuUTdREttc2kwU1hhZjg/view?usp=sharing
